00084 class DODSLog 
00085 {
00086 private:
00087     static DODSLog *    _instance ;
00088     int                 _flushed ;
00089     ofstream *          _file_buffer;
00090     // Flag to indicate the object is not routing data to its associated stream
00091     int                 _suspended ;
00092     // Flag to indicate whether to log verbose messages
00093     bool                _verbose ;
00094 protected:
00095     DODSLog(); 
00096 
00097     // Dumps the current system time.
00098     void                dump_time() ;
00099 public:
00100     ~DODSLog();
00101 
00107     void suspend()
00108     {
00109         _suspended = 1 ;
00110     }
00111 
00117     void resume()
00118     {
00119         _suspended = 0 ;
00120     }
00121 
00128     void verbose_on()
00129     {
00130         _verbose = true ;
00131     }
00132 
00138     void verbose_off()
00139     {
00140         _verbose = false ;
00141     }
00142 
00158     bool is_verbose()
00159     {
00160         return _verbose ;
00161     }
00162 
00164     typedef ios& (*p_ios_manipulator) (ios&);
00166     typedef ostream& (*p_ostream_manipulator) (ostream&);
